Reviews.Title: well made coupler
Reviews.Author: Michael S.
Reviews.Content: The couplers fit well and did the job they were meant to do. I have been using these couplers for some time and have had no problems.

Reviews.Title: Good and cheap, but not highest quality
Reviews.Author: Monty
Reviews.Content: I bought these for a set of security cameras, and while they work, they "feel" cheap and the conductor in the middle seems like it would break with minimal provocation.  I have to admit, however, once I installed these, they will not be messed with, and they are working well so far.  I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Tim Gindele
Reviews.Content: I don't know if it was a mistake, but I received 10 in the pack when I though I was buying only one. Even if it was only one it was worth the cost. Great product.

ProductInfo.Name: CIB CCTV BNC Female to Female Coupler Adapters Pack of 10 [Camera]
